actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A bill to provide for post card registration with respect to Federal elections.

summary.text: Requires each State to provide voter registration by mail, except under certain circumstances, for Federal elections by the use of post card application forms approved by the Federal Election Commission. Makes the chief election officer of each State responsible for the availability of post card registration forms in State and Federal facilities.

titles.title: A bill to provide for post card registration with respect to Federal elections.
